If you’re a fan of horror games, then you need to check out Evil Nun: The Broken Mask. This creepy and engaging game will send shivers down your spine as you navigate your way through a haunted school. Developed by Keplerians Horror Games, Evil Nun: The Broken Mask provides players with a thrilling experience that many other horror games fail to replicate. Here’s everything that you need to know about Evil Nun: The Broken Mask.

## Storyline

In Evil Nun: The Broken Mask, you play as a young boy who is trapped in a haunted school. The game begins with your character waking up in a dark room with no prior memory of how he got there. Your only goal is to escape the school and avoid the clutches of an evil nun who is constantly patrolling the halls. While trying to escape, you will uncover the secrets of the school and unravel the mystery behind the evil nun.

## Gameplay

Evil Nun: The Broken Mask provides players with a first-person perspective as they explore the haunted school. The controls are simple and easy to use, making the game accessible to players of all ages. However, the game is not easy as players need to be aware of their surroundings and make sure that they avoid the clutches of the evil nun. The nun is always on the hunt for her next victim and will stop at nothing to capture you. Players need to be cautious as the nun can appear out of nowhere, making the game even more thrilling.

## Graphics and Sound

The graphics of Evil Nun: The Broken Mask are superb and add to the horror theme of the game. The dark and eerie hallways of the school are well-designed and immerse players into the game’s world. The sound effects of the game are also well-crafted and add to the overall gaming experience. The sound of the evil nun’s footsteps and her ominous laughter will make players feel as though they are really in the game.

## Conclusion

Overall, Evil Nun: The Broken Mask is a must-play game for horror fans. The gameplay, graphics, and sound combine to create an eerie and thrilling experience that will have you hooked from start to finish. The game is available on both Android and iOS devices, and you can download it for free. So, what are you waiting for? Download Evil Nun: The Broken Mask and step into the world of horror gaming.
